game.name: Aquanore
game.categories: Single-player, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy idle aquarium game: collect, breed, and sell fish, shape your tank with decorations, grow your economy, and relax while your fish earn for you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy idle aquarium game: collect, breed, and sell fish, shape your tank with decorations, grow your economy, and relax while your fish earn for you.
